typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID_CITY as string,
		NO_COUNTRY as string,
		NO_CITY as string,
		SALES as string,
		DT_UPDATE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> australiacities
source(output(
		ID_CITY as string,
		POP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> population
australiacities, population join(australiacities@ID_CITY == population@ID_CITY,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(toInteger(SALES)>50) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sort(desc(SALES, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> outputdataflow1

parameters{
	parameter1 as string,
	parameter2 as string
}
source(output(
		ID_CITY as string,
		NO_COUNTRY as string,
		NO_CITY as string,
		SALES as string,
		DT_UPDATE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> australiacities2
australiacities2 derive(LOAD_DATETIME = $parameter1,
		USER = $parameter2) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

source(output(
		ID_CITY as string,
		NO_COUNTRY as string,
		NO_CITY as string,
		NO_STATE as string,
		SALES as string,
		DT_UPDATE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['PRODUCTCATEGORY.txt'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		ID_CITY as string,
		NO_COUNTRY as string,
		NO_CITY as string,
		NO_STATE as string,
		SALES as string,
		DT_UPDATE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ID_CITY'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		ID_CITY as string,
		NO_COUNTRY as string,
		NO_CITY as string,
		SALES as string,
		DT_UPDATE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ID_CITY'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		Employee_Data as (Id as string, Name as string, Dep as string, Salary as string, Projects as (ProjectId as string, Role as string)[])[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(Employee_Data.Projects),
	mapColumn(
		Id = Employee_Data.Id,
		Name = Employee_Data.Name,
		Dep = Employee_Data.Dep,
		Salary = Employee_Data.Salary,
		ProjectId = Employee_Data.Projects.ProjectId,
		Role = Employee_Data.Projects.Role
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 select(mapColumn(
		Id,
		Name,
		Dep,
		Salary,
		ProjectId,
		Role
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink3

source(output(
		name as string,
		location as string,
		satellites as string[],
		goods as (trade as boolean, customers as string[], orders as (orderId as string, orderTotal as double, shipped as (orderItems as (itemName as string, itemQty as string)[]))[])
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(goods.orders.shipped.orderItems),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		orderid = goods.orders.orderId,
		satellites,
		itemname = goods.orders.shipped.orderItems.itemName,
		itemQty = goods.orders.shipped.orderItems.itemQty
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 select(mapColumn(
		name,
		orderid,
		satellites,
		itemname,
		itemQty
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
